author: larryi
msg: Add new "dos_devices" test to the list.

author: larryi
msg: Add tests to ensure JSP pages whose names match Windows DOS device
names, such as aux.jsp, return "not found".

author: larryi
msg: Avoid NPE when setDependency() is hit with an unsafe path.  Return 404

author: larryi
msg: Try to avoid denial of service attack where a JSP page uses a name
matching a Windows DOS device name, such as aux.jsp. Otherwise,
attempting to read the device may hang the thread servicing the request.
